mapper.update: update user_base_info set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version_no = #{versionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, nickname, head_img_url, mobile_phone, province, city, county, intro, `status`, update_time, create_time, version_no from user_base_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
